args:
Emile is despondent, believing that Leonidas
has died protecting him. With his younger
brother's encouragement, he resolves to get
revenge for Leonidas's death, and agrees to
cooperate with his siblings at last.
It took you long enough. And I don't\nsee Leonidas... Where is he?
I went right down to check the bottom of\nthe cliffs, but I couldn't find any sign of\nhim. I really hope he's okay.
What sort of fantasy world are you living\nin? It's a veritable deathtrap of rocky reefs\nand wild waves down there!
That FOOL... He had it coming! Going on\nand on with his holier-than-thou attitude,\njust to drop dead that easily?!
Pardon that crass display. And here I call\nmyself a paragon of ladylike decorum...
I could, sure, but...I think it might\nbe better if you went, don't you?

If I went, he'd simply end up obeying my
commands as a matter of course. That
would be far from securing his genuine
cooperation.
If we want him to work with us in the\ntruest sense, he needs to come back of\nhis own volition.
In that respect, I think he'd stand to benefit\nmost from the counsel of his little brother.
I do. So please, go and take care of him.
Emiiile! Please, I want to talk!
Not this way... Where are you, Emile?
There you are, Brother.\nI've been looking for you.
What do you want, scum? Did Chelle send\nyou here to drag me back?
Please, stop. It avails you nothing to be so\nnegative. Those of us that remain have to\nwork together if we want out of this crisis.
Rrrgh... How can you be so calm?\nWhat do YOU know about how I feel?!
Leonidas died because of ME! If only he\nhadn't protected me, he'd still be...\nDamn it! Why?!
He's the one who went on and on about\nsurviving. Why would he risk everything\nfor my sake?
He had to have known that the one who\nwas REALLY supposed to die there was—
That's enough, Emile! We still don't know\nfor certain that Leonidas even died.
And do you really think Leonidas was\nthinking of it the way you're describing?
He said that in order to survive here,\nwe had to join forces and cooperate.
When he protected you, he believed that\nwas necessary too. I'm sure he doesn't\nregret doing it.
This is all wild speculation at best.
Leonidas isn't the kind of man to rush in\nhalf-cocked. Surely you realize that, Emile.
You talk like you know everything,\nLittle Brother. But...you might be right.

Ever since we were young, I've been
jealous of our brother's strength. Not just
his martial prowess or his leadership, but
the strength of his will.
That's why I wondered WHY he came to my\naid. Why would he take a hit for me of all\npeople?

I just don't know. My head has been a
mess of emotions ever since. I feel so
pathetic for being protected, but also
so happy...
Go back to Chelle,\n{player_name}. I...\nI'll come back shortly.
...Okay. We'll be waiting for you, Brother.
You're finally back. Honestly, did you\nstop and smell every rose on the way?
Don't just stand there slack-jawed. Come\nhere and eat. I must say, I outdid myself\nwith this dish!
How in the world did you manage to\nmake CURRY on a deserted island?
Eee hee hee! A true lady has her ways.
Reflect well upon your sister's kindness\nthrough this meal. Now, eat up, boys!
Er, shouldn't we be thinking about our\nnext move instead?
We can talk about that after we eat. First\nwe must cultivate the strength to fight.
...You DID come back to fight together\nwith us, yes?
...Hmph. Just so! {player_name},\nhand me my curry. And make it snappy!
Now, then. It's time for us to discuss what\ncomes next. What are your thoughts?
I...want to avenge Leonidas.\nNo—I MUST avenge him!
Leonidas died protecting me from that\nfiend. I can't let his sacrifice be in vain.
That's why I, um... T-to beat that monster,\nI...want to us to co—*cough* Co...oper...
For the love of—! If you want us to\ncooperate with you, just say so.
Ack! L-listen, you! I was trying\nto figure out how to phrase it.
Hee hee. I forget how fun it is to watch\nyou squirm.
It's okay, Emile. We're siblings. We know\nwhat you want to say, even without the\nwords.
And now I'm being lectured by my younger\nbrother. The impudence of it all! *sigh*\nI suppose...I will overlook it just this once.
Okay, listen up! I COULD have done this\nmyself, honestly. But I am going to grace\nyou with the opportunity to help me.
We siblings shall band together and avenge\nour brother Leonidas!
